mods.abstract: One color window card (black on white) announcing the Bluegrass Spectacular featuring Bill Monroe and the Bluegrass Boys, Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys, and James Monroe at the WJAT Auditorium on March 16. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Monroe, Jim and Jesse, and James Monroe.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
